135.content:
Times had changed. That much went without saying. Essentially losing your status as a human was... demeaning, to say the least. But what could anyone do? When the rest of the world's population towered over your kind, the best option was to run and hide.

Of course, that didn't help. It only took a few months for about 95% of the world's Caucasians to end up in some form of slavery. Between Africa's slow advance on what was once western Europe, China's superior technology, and the Middle East's immense wealth and influence, there was little the whites could do. Some were allowed to keep jobs - generally the worst ones around were reserved for them, even - but on the whole, it was a life of poverty and starvation. Females of 'breeding age' - 13 to 30 - were supported by their local governments if they were found to be actively trying to get pregnant, however those caught attempting to cheat the system were severely punished. The best case scenario for a 'tiny' who couldn't find a job or get pregnant was to solicit themselves out to anyone who would take them. Some would find reliable work this way. Others, if they were lucky, were even taken into their client's home as a 'personal' tiny. Those who were picky about their clients, or worse, unsatisfactory... well, it often ended badly, shall we say.

Safe to say, it wasn't easy being white any more. Choose your protagonist.
135.title: White

14.content: Now choose the race of the main protagonist.

141.content:
At this time, almost all White people are plus or minus about five inches tall, depending on their age, and gender with children obviously smaller than their parents are. The Earth as we know it is divided into three super nations, Eurasia, which controls all of Asia, Australia, New Zealand, Russia, and Eastern Europe. The African Empire, which controls all of Africa, Western Europe, and part of North America, and The Latin Republic which controls South America, Central America, and part of North America. Science has advanced a lot as well, with colonies under the ocean and on the Moon and Mars. Robots are everywhere serving the ruling classes of Earth.

Right now thirty-five-year-old Lisa, her twelve-year-old son Kevin and her two daughters fourteen-year-old Emily and ten-year-old Chrissie are visiting a White only segregated park designated for miniature Caucasian people in what used to be the old United States. They are having a pleasant time as this attractive, blonde haired, blue-eyed family cautiously walks around these huge skyscraper size trees in this park looking around nervously for any signs of danger. Lisa always thought it was stupid for the giants to set up a park complete with miniature benches, rides, and food stands for them, but leave the plant life at normal size. What really concerns her thou, is the lack of any meaningful security or fencing to keep the giants from entering.

As the doll size milf leads her attractive kids around the area, they are unaware they, and a few other tiny White families along with a few tiny White couples have caught the attention of a sadistic, rich, bisexual mad scientist/teacher nearby. The cruel giant looks Lisa over, and loves watching her perky, natural, grapefruit size breasts jiggling around as she walks around the park. “Thank god for tank tops,” he quietly says to himself, “and her oldest daughter seems to have nice boobs too, and check out their asses. Oh her son seems well hung, yum.”

As the doll size White, people go about their business; they are still unaware that a giant Black scientist is getting ready to abduct most of them.

The giant Black man gets his tiny White specimens/toys how?
141.title: Giant Black Mad Scientist

1452311.content:
Forget time and consider this is an alternate timeline where Chloe Moretz is as old as she would be today.

Things had been difficult for Chloe Moretz, since she was a white person, she ended up shrinking down just as her career started to get going. Not that the other white actressess werent' having the same effect. She remembered being there having tea with Aaron Taylor Johnson when she immediately felt herself getting smaller.

It was only a few short years before Chloe Moretz was now only five inches tall.

She would often resort to wearing kleenex and nothing else or tiny makeshift dresses. She had a brief stint as Tinkerbell in a new live action movie which was fortunate for her seeing how every other tiny actress was fighting for that role, but after a few movies she found that there were no more offers coming.

One day in her makeshift dollhouse that was placed in a special suburb in Los Angeles, Chloe got out of bed, walked into the shower and cleaned herself.

"Well, shit, my life has sucked being tiny for this long, maybe today things will turn around for me."

Chloe Moretz got out of the shower, wrapped herself in a blue towel and her wet blonde hair in a white one and looked at herself in the mirror.

"I may be small but I am still sexy" Chloe then let out a laugh before she heard thundering footsteps that shook her whole dollhouse. "What the fuck was that?"

Then suddenly the entire roof was ripped off of her house, the towel clad mini star screamed in terror as she saw the giant face of...
1452311.title: The Life of Tiny Chloe Moretz

choices: "I booked you for a new project"
"I found someone willing to buy you"
"I've decided to make you my pet"
14523111.content:
Chloe hid for cover and saw the giant face of her agent, Cynthia Yung staring down at her.

Cynthia was a 40 year old Asian woman with long black hair, big boobs, a thick ass, and almost neon white teeth.

"Hey there, Chloe. Sorry did I interrupt my little star?"

"Uh yeah, Cynthia. You don't go ripping off my roof like that, especially when I'm only wearing a towel."

"Aww, don't be like that, cutie."

Cynthia then reached in and grabbed Chloe, Chloe tried to hold onto her towel as she was gripped tightly by the giant Asian beauty and brought up to her massive face.

"Not so tight, Cynthia, God."

"I'm sorry Chloe." Cynthia said with a cooing smile. "But I just had to find you to tell some big news I have for you little girl."

"What news is that?" Chloe said while struggling to get out of her agent's tight fingers.
14523111.title: Chloe's Agent Comes to Play

14523113.title: A non white female celebrity

15.content: Now choose the race of the main protagonist.

info.brief_description: A shrinking/giant tribute to the amazing stories of makebelieve12
info.description:
A tribute to the amazing shrinking/growth stories of makebelieve12 you can find him here! https://www.deviantart.com/makebelieve12 please go read his other amazing stories and support him!

At first, no one took notice. What was 2 inches over a generation? As the generations grew, however, so did the number. By 2133, the average height of the Caucasian male of European descent was 4ft 3in, down from the peak of 5ft 11in in 2042. During this time, governments scrambled to find the source of this frightening change in genetics, fearing that it may signal a change in other ethnicities and races. All scientists could determine was that the root cause was a virus which had adapted to this specific group due to how they had processed Vitamin D.
By 2240, 99% of Caucasians stood below 2ft. Over the course of this great generational shrinking, other races began to fear the virus less and less as it became apparent whites were the only ones affected year after year. As Caucasians diminished in size, other races quickly filled their places in society and the economy of the world. By 2280, whites were now at a solid 1ft tall. It was around this time that things began to take a turn for the worse for the incredible shrinking race.
The middle-east was first to take advantage of the situation. In 2278, the Greater United Arabian Peninsula passed laws which officially made whites âtradable personsâ this opened the door for an entire economy based on the capture, breeding, and trade of whites as they continued to shrink. Though the world initially condemned the GUAP for its actions, the nationâs economy saw a large increase in outside demand for its stock of the tiny race. Five years later, the Chinese prosperity sphere followed suit, hoping to capitalize on the situation.
Having been in a state of continuous shrinking for nearly 200 years, whites were viewed as a ârace on the declineâ and expendable by the rest of Earthâs populations. The ownership and trade of Caucasians exploded in 2300. Some nations and corporations even funded research to see if they could help the shrinking process along. By 2385, whites stood at an average height of 5-inches.
In the current year 2390, Caucasians were no longer viewed as people. They were firmly creatures to be controlled by the remaining races. Subjugated into slavery, as pets, or even for food. Though there were kinds souls in the world who seeked to help and care for the powerless people; the planet, as a whole had turned on the tiny race.
